Control¶

class node.Control(name, parent=None, path='.')¶

Bases: node.Node

The Control node oversees connected Devices, allowing the Inputs to be algorithmically tuned to optimize some target function.

__init__(name, parent=None, path='.')¶

Initializes a Control node and attaches Clock, Historian, and Optimizer objects.

actuate(state, save=True)¶

Updates all Inputs in the given state to the given values. Argument should have keys of the form 'Device.Input', e.g. state={'MEMS.X':0}

get_sequence()¶
get_subsequence(keys)¶

Returns a sequence dict containing only the specified keys

get_substate(keys)¶

Returns a state dict containing only the specified keys

instances = []¶

Contains all currently instantiated Nodes. This can be accessed for a given type, e.g. Control.instances lists all Control nodes.

list_costs()¶

Returns a list of all methods tagged with the '@cost' decorator.

load(name)¶

Loads a state from a text file.

onLoad()¶
save()¶

Saves the current state to a text file.
